column4: hello, was wondering what people use for backing up.. first off i wanted to copy my install and move it to a smaller partition, to free up my large partition.
a second computer + scp (and svn for the more importaint stuff (work, etc))
I keep a copy of /var/cache/apt (minus partial and lock) in the other folder, so I can reinstall, scp back my files, scp back the archives and let it update
